name: The story of the 7 Lives
description:
The story of the 7 Lives

A game made in 4 days for the Nokia3310 game jam.

In this narrative experience, you play as a curious cat who wants to test the limits of death and life.

Controls:

 - Left and Right arrows to move
 - Up arrow to jump
 - Space to close text boxes
 - Escape to quit
 - M to mute/unmute
 - P to pause game

Technical details:

 - Screen resolution of 84x48 , 2 colors.
 - All the pixels are snapped to the grid (no half pixels)
 - Monophonic music created using the soundfont provided on the game jam's page.
 - Programmed from scratch in Python.

Credits:

 - Programming and audio :  Me
 - Pixel art and animation:  My brother
